NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
COLEUS: Melorae, are you ready? We are finally ready to begin our first expedition to the Quantum Moon!
2
1
MELORAE: Of course I am, Coleus! I have looked forward to this fateful expedition for so long!
3 2
MELORAE: Where is Thatch? We agreed to meet here at the Quantum Moon Locator before we set off, did we not? He is running late!
4
3
COLEUS: We have waited some time, but Thatch has still not arrived. Could he have lost his way? Or..
5
4
COLEUS: Could he have confused our instructions for another <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator?</color>
6
5
MELORAE: But Coleus, this is the only Quantum Moon Locator on the Hourglass Twins! Unless... Could our friends on Brittle Hollow have had the same idea to build a Quantum Moon Locator before our reunion?
7
6
COLEUS: We cannot proceed with this expedition without Thatch. It would not be safe to conduct the expedition without
8
7
SOLANUM: If time allows, I shall try to find this second <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> to learn its secrets!
BH_QML R1 4
R_SLR R3 5
BH_QML R3 5
